plan_analysis:
The forecaster’s goal is to estimate which nominee—Bugonia, Frankenstein, Sinners, or “Other”—will be announced as Best Picture at the 98th Oscars in roughly two weeks.  
Already known: nothing beyond the question text.  
Needed evidence:

1. Base rate / historical precedents  
   • How reliably do precursor awards (PGA, DGA, BAFTA, Golden Globes, SAG Ensemble) predict Best Picture?  
   • How often do upsets occur and under what conditions (e.g., preferential ballot quirks, vote-splits)?  
   • Historical accuracy of betting markets.

2. Resolution mechanism  
   • Confirmation that oscars.org will publish the winner; mechanics are straightforward but a quick primer on preferential ballot voting can clarify drivers of surprise outcomes.

3. Key drivers for 2026 race  
   • Results of this season’s precursor awards.  
   • Current betting odds / prediction markets.  
   • Industry commentary on campaign strength, controversies, or shifts in sentiment.

4. Current state  
   • Which film has already won the major precursors (PGA, BAFTA, etc.) and critics’ awards.  
   • Latest odds and pundit forecasts less than two weeks from ceremony.

5. Contrarian check  
   • Articles or commentary highlighting scenarios where the perceived front-runner could lose or where a vote-split boosts an underdog, informed by past upsets.

The eight queries below are designed to collect that evidence: five historical (base-rate, mechanism, upset frequency) and three current (recent precursor results, odds, expert commentary).

queries_planned.query: PGA Best Picture winners vs Oscar
queries_planned.intent: Quantify how often the Producers Guild of America winner matches the eventual Oscar Best Picture.

queries_planned.query: Golden Globe Best Picture correlation Oscar
queries_planned.intent: Determine historic alignment rates between Golden Globe winners (Drama/Comedy) and Oscar Best Picture.

queries_planned.query: Preferential ballot Oscar Best Picture analysis
queries_planned.intent: Explain how the Academy’s ranked-choice ballot influences outcomes and potential surprise winners.
Identify and summarize past years when presumed favorites lost, giving a base rate for upsets.

queries_planned.query: Provide statistics for last 20 Oscar cycles comparing winners of PGA, DGA, BAFTA Best Film, Golden Globe (Drama), and SAG Ensemble to eventual Best Picture winners; calculate hit rates and highlight patterns
queries_planned.intent: Produce a consolidated dataset of precursor predictive power.

queries_planned.query: Bugonia Frankenstein Sinners betting odds Oscars
queries_planned.intent: Retrieve the latest bookmaker or prediction-market odds for each nominee to gauge market consensus.
Confirm which film just won the 2026 Producers Guild Award, a key predictor.

queries_planned.query: Recent analysis 98th Oscars Best Picture race industry experts
queries_planned.intent: Surface up-to-date expert commentary, including contrarian takes on potential upsets or vote-split scenarios.
